org.drip.measure.continuous

Class R1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.R1
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundedUniformIntegerDistribution, PoissonDistribution, R1Uniform, R1UnivariateNormal

    public abstract class R1
extends java.lang.Object
    R1 implements the Base Abstract Class behind R^1 Distributions. It exports the Methods for incremental, cumulative, and inverse cumulative distribution densities.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
